snippet: Dr. Margaret Chan, the director general of the health organization, said the drug industry’s drive for profit was one reason no vaccine had yet been found for Ebola.
abstract: World Health Organization leader Dr Margaret Chan criticizes drug industry at conference in Cotonou, Benin, saying drive for profit is one reason no vaccine has yet been found for Ebola; Chan also denounces glaring absence of effective public health systems in worst-affected countries.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Margaret Chan, the director general of the health organization, said the drug industry’s drive for profit was one reason no vaccine had yet been found for Ebola.

headline.main: W.H.O. Assails Delay in Ebola Vaccine
headline.print_headline: W.H.O. Assails Delay in Ebola Vaccine
